channel.description: Recent content in Groundworks on Magic Book

item.title: This is a Title
item.description: Above, you can see the folder, Title, Author and Date. Below you can see both a pasted image, and a youtube video. I am able to have my notes translated to something that is comaptible with Hugo. This does not use the same technique as I did, but it seems to work. He does not note the screw inside of the device, so perhaps I will need to find a video that goes over that.

item.title: Anaconda
item.description: Anaconda Anaconda will be useful for maintaining a clean environment for python programming.
Basic commands with HUGO ideally I need to figure out how to add items to the PATH

*GalliumOS *uses xfce4 which is a Linux desktop environment. xfce4 uses something called xfce screenshooter which is the built in screenshot application. (it may actually be seperate but it comes with GalliumOS) You can go to keyboard settings in GalliumOS and change the command that is run to screenshot a selection instead of the entire screen. In my case I used the command xfce4-screenshooter -c -r

Need to find a website that can be generated by markdown documents like obsidian and can do links like obsidian. I found something before, but I will need to dig around and try to find it again. I want a very fast way to generate webpages without having to try too hard. If I can generate traffic, perhaps I will be able to do something with that traffic. 3m ago
